tool_description: Evaluates whether proposed corrections maintain contextual appropriateness, meaning consistency, and natural language flow within the broader text context.

proposed_corrections.description: Corrections to validate for contextual appropriateness

context_window.description: Number of words to consider around each correction for context (5-50)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: proposed_corrections and correction_positions must have the same length.
Invalid context window: Must be between 5 and 50 words.
Empty correction data: Provide at least one correction for validation.
Text too long: Maximum 25,000 characters for context validation.
usage: Provide original text, proposed corrections, and their positions, optionally set context window size. Returns validation results for each correction.

validation_scores.description: Contextual appropriateness scores (0-1) for each correction

rejected_corrections.description: Corrections rejected due to contextual issues
